channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Am I simply the unloved son?’ My mother ghosted me after my father died. Is she stealing his money?
item.description: “No phone calls, no holiday cards, no explanation, no anything.”

item.title: ‘Affordability is a con job for consumers’: 2025 was one hell of a year. What can we learn from it?
item.description: Tariffs, an AI boom, geopolitical divisions and a new administration ushered in a unique, unsettling year for consumers.

item.title: ‘We all have economic jitters’: After the Fed cut rates, should my son buy a $600K house?
item.description: “They are tuned in to friends and colleagues, who are losing jobs, cognizant of shifts in company agendas and financial worries.”

item.title: Maroon 5 frontman Adam Levine and supermodel Behati Prinsloo buy a $17 million chunk of Oprah’s ‘promised land’ estate
item.description: California is home to hundreds of properties with celebrity history—but it’s unlikely any dwelling can compete with the legacy of the one that was jus...

item.title: ‘The stress at my job is getting worse every day’: I’m 61, earn $177K, and have a 401(k) with $965K. Do I retire and downsize?
item.description: “I don’t want to end up in a nursing home on Medicare like my grandma.”

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...
